mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectMbrBukmkBrnd Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ MBR_NO , MALL_ID , BRND_ID , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM MBR_BUKMK_BRND WHERE 1 = 1 AND MBR_NO = #{mbrNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MALL_ID = #{mallId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND BRND_ID = #{brndId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
